reasoning: Pulmonary artery atresia is an extremely rare congenital heart defect. Birth prevalence estimated at 1 in 100,000-1 in 150,000 live births (~0.3 per 100k person-years). Using incidence metric for this congenital condition. Limited epidemiological surveillance data; confidence reduced due to rarity and variable reporting.
source: Hoffman JI, Kaplan S. (2002). The incidence of congenital heart disease. J Am Coll Cardiol. 39(12):1890-900
